TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit RuntimeNamePropertyAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class RuntimeNamePropertyAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class RuntimeNamePropertyAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 表示类型级别的特性，该特性报告类型的哪个属性映射到 XAML [x:Name 特性](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-name-directive.md)。

span.span: Represents a type-level attribute that reports which property of the type maps to the XAML [x:Name attribute](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-name-directive.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中指定的属性的类型必须为并且必须是读/写。The property that is specified in the must be of type and must be read/write. 框架可能在其体系结构基元素是等效的 XAML 名称属性之一的某一属性。Frameworks might attribute a certain property of one its architectural base elements to be the XAML name equivalent. 这样做是以便可以在运行时可采用框架的编程模型中 XAML 名称范围在 XAML 加载时设置 XAML 名称的概念。This is done so that the concept of a XAML name in a XAML namescope set at XAML load time is available to a framework's programming model at run time. 必须使用 XAML 名称值[XamlName 语法](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/xamlname-grammar.md)。A XAML name value must use the [XamlName Grammar](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/xamlname-grammar.md). 在以前版本的.NET Framework 中，此类特定于 WPF 程序集 WindowsBase 中存在。In previous versions of the .NET Framework, this class existed in the WPF-specific assembly WindowsBase. 在[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]，位于 System.Xaml 程序集中。In [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], is in the System.Xaml assembly. 有关详细信息，请参阅[类型从 WPF 迁移到 System.Xaml](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/types-migrated-from-wpf-to-system-xaml.md)。For more information, see [Types Migrated from WPF to System.Xaml](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/types-migrated-from-wpf-to-system-xaml.md). ## WPF 用法说明WPF Usage Notes 中的现有类的示例[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]其中应用是。An example of an existing class in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] where the is applied is . 属性具有，这会导致任何派生类还使用作为其运行时名称属性。The property on is attributed with , which results in any derived class also using as its run-time name property. 一般情况下，你通常不需要以应用在 WPF 中此特性，除非你要实现新或-并行框架级别类。In general, you do not typically need to apply this attribute in WPF unless you are implementing a new or -parallel framework-level class. `x:Name` 应优先于运行时名称属性如果两者都存在作为上一个元素的属性在此情况下通常会引发一个 XAML 处理器实现。`x:Name` should take precedence over the run-time name property if both exist as attributes on an element, and a XAML processor implementation generally throws in this case.

param.span: 用作类的 等效项的属性的名称。

span.span: The name of the property to use as the equivalent of the class.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定的属性的类型必须为和具有 get 和 set 访问。The specified property must be of type and have get and set access.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Name As String

summary.span: 获取由此 指定的运行时名称属性的名称。

span.span: Gets the name of the runtime name property that is specified by this .
